name: Trash Dash (Dorsey Bros.)
description:
Trash Dash is a fun game about a tire trying to reach a goal. Build a pile of junk to help that happen. Trash Dash has 15 levels, original music, and all original art. You can even change your tires look by pressing down on the menu scene!

Featuring art by: Hieronymus Johnson! (Check their work out)

Controls used are W, A, D and a mouse.

takes about 20-30 minutes to complete!

Works good for children and adults!

Is very fun to speedrun!
